channel.title: Web3 on Yuxin Fan
channel.description: Recent content in Web3 on Yuxin Fan

item.title: CoolChat Platform System Design: Scalable and Secure Chat Architecture
item.description: A scalable, real-time chat platform leveraging Web3 authentication, microservices architecture, and message queuing for high concurrency and performance.

item.title: Web3 Wallet Authentication System: A Decentralized Approach
item.description: An innovative Web3 wallet-based authentication system, ensuring secure access to chat applications without traditional password-based login methods.
